target.name: show-usage
target.description: Prints usage help for each available Ant target.
target.echo:
Ant targets: - show-usage: prints the help you are now reading.
- deploy: deploys the Web application by copying it to a directory. The default directory is C:\inetpub\wwwroot\posanalysis. If you would like to choose a different directory, specify it on the Ant command line:
ant deploy -Ddir=C:\path\to\app\directory
- generate-doc: generates the user documentation from the contents of README.md. This will overwrite the user documentation in the Web application!
